sections.title: Welcome!
body: Welcome Internet Traveler! My name is Jan ( pronounced like "yawn" ) Fic, and you have traversed the internet to see my website.

I make games, software, and pixel art, and this portfolio is a place where you can glimps at my software, game, and pixel art projects. On the left side ( desktop ) or the bottom ( mobile ) of your screen you can scroll or slide to see various of my projects.

Each project has some tags describing what you might find, and if you do click to explore that project you'll find a dedicated page for the project, which may include code, game design documents, dev logs, and more!
Feel free to explore this and other pages.

sections.title: About Jan Fic
body: Education: Computer Science, New College of Florida, May 2022
Social Media: GitHub, LinkedIn, Twitter, Website, Itch.io
Quick Skills (See Resume for Details): Software Engineering, Java, Python, Amazon Web Services, Google Firebase, Java Game Frameworks, Angular, Pixel Art
